meanings.sent1: The nettlesome noise of the construction work next door kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: Her nettlesome habit of interrupting others made it difficult to have a conversation with her.
meanings.sent3: The nettlesome fly buzzing around the room seemed determined to annoy everyone.
meanings.sent4: The nettlesome traffic jam felt like a never-ending maze of frustration.
meanings.sent5: The nettlesome dripping faucet was like a constant reminder of unfinished business.

meanings.sent1: He was nettlesome whenever someone disagreed with his opinions.
meanings.sent2: The nettlesome child would throw tantrums over the smallest things.
meanings.sent3: The nettlesome cat would hiss at anyone who tried to pet it.
meanings.sent4: Her nettlesome temper was like a storm waiting to erupt at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The nettlesome customer complained about every little detail, making the waiter's job difficult.
